elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Altitude of sensor
elementSets.description: The altitude of the platform of an aerial photography or remote sensing sensor.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Attitude of sensor
elementSets.description: The attitude of a sensed image resulting from the angle of an aerial photography or remote sensing sensor.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Category of satellite
elementSets.description: The category of satellite for a remote sensing image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Character
elementSets.description: The character of a cartographic Image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Colour indicator
elementSets.description: Indicator of the use of colour on a cartographic item.

elementSets.description: The form of a cartographic item,

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Map projection
elementSets.description: The type of map projection of a cartographic item.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Name of satellite
elementSets.description: The name of the satellite for a remote sensing image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Planet
elementSets.description: The planet to which cartographic materials apply.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Position of platform
elementSets.description: The position of the platform for a photographic or remote sensing image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Presentation technique
elementSets.description: Presentation technique for a photographic or non-photographic cartographic image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Recording technique for remote sensing image
elementSets.description: The recording technique for a remote sensing image.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Relief
elementSets.description: The type of relief of a cartographic item.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Cartographic materials: Type of scale
elementSets.description: The type of scale of a cartographic item.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Church mode of musical work
elementSets.description: The "Gregorian" church mode of a musical work.

elementSets.description: The frequency of a  serial or continuing resource.

elementSets.description: The type of data carrier.

elementSets.description: The form of a musical work.

elementSets.description: The type of music score.

elementSets.title: UNIMARC: Key of musical work
elementSets.description: The key of a musical work.

elementSets.description: Instruments and/or voices, devices and other performers which make up a musical work.

elementSets.description: Type of intended audience.

elementSets.description: The type of data file.

vocabularies.description: The form of a cartographic item,

vocabularies.description: The type of map projection of a cartographic item.

vocabularies.description: The planet to which cartographic materials apply.

vocabularies.description: The position of the platform for a photographic or remote sensing image.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Graphics: Functional designation
vocabularies.description: The functional form of the graphics item.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Graphics: Primary support material
vocabularies.description: The type of material used for the primary support (i.e., the support or base on which an image is printed or executed) of a non-projected graphic.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Graphics: Specific material designation
vocabularies.description: The specific material designation that describes the special class of material (usually  the class of physical object) to which the non-projected graphic item belongs.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Graphics: Technique (prints)
vocabularies.description: The technique in which prints are executed.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Graphics: Techniques (drawings, paintings)
vocabularies.description: The technique in which drawing and paintings are executed.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Accompanying textual material
vocabularies.description: The contents of programme notes and other accompanying text of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Dimensions
vocabularies.description: The diameter of an open reel tape or a disc, or the dimensions of a cassette, cartridge or cylinder form of sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Form of release
vocabularies.description: The form of release of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Groove width
vocabularies.description: The width of the grooves on sound recording discs.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Kind of cutting
vocabularies.description: The kind of cutting of a sound recording disk or cylinder.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Kind of sound
vocabularies.description: The recording mode of a sound recording,

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Recording technique
vocabularies.description: The recording technique of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Special reproduction characteristics
vocabularies.description: The reproduction characteristics of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Speed
vocabularies.description: The speed of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Tape configuration
vocabularies.description: The tape configuration of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Tape width
vocabularies.description: The width of a tape of a sound recording.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Sound recordings: Type of recording
vocabularies.description: The type of sound recording disc, cylinder or tape.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Church mode of musical work
vocabularies.description: The "Gregorian" church mode of a musical work.

vocabularies.description: The frequency of a  serial or continuing resource.

vocabularies.description: The type of data carrier.

vocabularies.description: The type of music score.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Key of musical work
vocabularies.description: The key of a musical work.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Medium of performance
vocabularies.description: Instruments and/or voices, devices and other performers which make up a musical work.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Target audience
vocabularies.description: Type of intended audience.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Type of electronic resource
vocabularies.description: The type of data file.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Three-dimensional artefacts and realia: Material
vocabularies.description: The type of material a three-dimensional artefact or realia is made of.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Three-dimensional artefacts and realia: Specific material designation
vocabularies.description: The specific material designation that describes the special class of material (usually the class of physical object) to which the three-dimensional artefact or realis item belongs.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Visual projections, etc.: Accompanying material
vocabularies.description: The types of material that accompany a visual projection, videorecording, or motion picture.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Visual projections, etc.: Colour
vocabularies.description: The colour characteristics of a visual projection, videorecording, or motion picture.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Visual projections, etc.: Form of release - videorecording
UNIMARC: Visual projections, etc.: Form of release - visual projection, motion picture
vocabularies.description: The form of release of a visual projection or motion picture.

vocabularies.title: UNIMARC: Visual projections, etc.: Media for sound
vocabularies.description: The medium used to carry the sound, when sound is present, of a visual projection, videorecording, or motion picture.
